name: Find Him
description:
You are playing hide and seek with Him. Enter the dark. Inspect carefully and get to know his house. Look for something different or something out of place. Him will be there. Discover all the possible anomalies.
DO NOT LET HIM FOOL YOU. DO NOT MISS. FIND HIM

Features

  • The game has 21 anomalies.
  • During the game Him wiil chalenge you to run against time.
  • The game is challenging and requires a lot of attention from the player.
  • The game has two endings: a good and a bad.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782990/Find_Him
